content: Bus depot located in Bukit Batok **Bukit Batok Bus Depot** is a [bus depot](/wiki/Bus_garage) located at 550 [Bukit Batok](/wiki/Bukit_Batok) Street 23, [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) 659519. It is over 50,000 square metres, with bus washing facilities, a canteen, and fuel stations. ## History Bukit Batok Bus Depot was built by SBS for $12 million, commencing operations in January 1985 replacing the old bus depots at Alexandra and Woodlands, including the Portsdown, Whitley and King Albert bus parks. The King Albert bus park was demolished to make way for King Albert Park. The Green Bus garage was formerly located at Toh Tuck, and was relocated in 1974. This Singapore bus-related article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Bukit Batok Bus Depot
